I'm a second year PhD student at the University of Pennsylvania in the Computer and Information Science department. I am grateful to be advised by Professor DanaÃ« Metaxa as a member of Penn HCI. My work is supported by an AWS gift for research in Trustworthy AI. Broadly my interests are in human-computer interaction and computational social science with a current focus on auditing social computing systems. Prior to Penn I worked as a software engineer on recommendation systems at Apple, and on data analytics at Sisu Data. I studied Computer Science (MS) and Symbolic Systems (BS) at Stanford University.
